name: Casey White
text: We came to this restaurant for dinner. we heard about this restaurant from quite a few people.  Well, we were not disappointed. The staff were very polite and we felt very good. The meal was delicious. We loved this restaurant a lot and we will definitely return to this restaurant. Recommended.

name: Betty Sue Batton
text: Hair was in my food the manager was very rude I gave  her several chances to make it right she hung up on me I would never eat hear again

name: Tracey Weston
text: I adore this spot! They have fantastic dishes, their menu is nice, The chief cook in that place is a professional, I like a lot trying all their dishes. The dishes are consistently of high qualtity, the attitude towards the customers  is nice. I often eat in this place and I was never disappointed.  I highly recommend it.

name: Rickie Tierney
text: This place is worth a try. They serve large portions for affordable prices. Always clean and with great atmosphere. Will come visit again.

name: Ken Fulk
text: I tried this spot already with my friend and I am obsessed ever since. I liked the great ambience and fresh dishes and beverages. I recommend this place.

name: faith rile
text: It's close to home, fast service, and super delicious bread sticks & pizza made exactly as you want it! Also located inside a small store,& gas station, making it easy to get other things you may need for your enjoyment, or gas, if your on the go w/your food!
